author: marvin
msg: Differentiate some type names only in lexer.
Since we now always pass the value of the type specifier from the lexer to the
parser, it is no longer necessary to differentiate between certain classes of
type name -- so e.g. all integer type names can share the same terminal token

author: marvin
msg: Use origin file to determine source class.

author: marvin
msg: Refactor away some static string variables.

author: marvin
msg: Have the lexer always copy the text that it matches into a new string
(allocated from the parser's memory pool) and pass that value to the parser.
This allows us to simplify the parser somewhat.
